snippet.title: Bat Boy Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Ryosuke isn't just your regular high-school kid. He and his fellow sports-star friends secretly battle against the evil invading forces of Lord Vicious, hellbent on hosting sinister athletic events for his own amusement! 

Aided by the power granted to them by nameless deities, Ryosuke is Bat Boy!

Co-Developed by X Plus Games & Sonzai Games

Twitter: https://twitter.com/XPlusGames 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SonzaiGames
Website: https://batboythegame.com/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1709350/Bat_Boy/
